predicate.note: Frames file for 'keen' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: a sharp, biting, or piercing wail

example.name: sirens
example.text: Unsinkable slowed and stopped, hundreds of brilliant white flares swayed eerily down from the black, the air raid sirens ashore rose in a keening shriek, the anti-aircraft guns coughed and chattered.
